title: ADC mains: "Ziggs replacing adcs bot lane shouldn't be a thing"
body:
Also ADC mains: "Top lane isn't a lane only for bruisers, get over it"

Season 4 worlds: Ryze/Lulu/Alistar/Maokai
Season 5 worlds: Gnar/Lulu
Season 6 worlds: Kennen/Jayce/Gnar

replies.body: where did you get these quotes from?

> [{quoted}](name=Summoner Grey,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=b199sdJA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-07T02:42:35.258+0000)
>
> where did you get these quotes from?

Adc Mains
I don't think most ADC mains care about Ziggs, they just want the 4/5-man gangbang meta to end.
I haven't seen 1 ADC player complain about Ziggs going bot. The only posts I see are from top laners trying to circle jerk this thing.

> [{quoted}](name=Solaire,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=b199sdJA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-01-07T02:43:13.001+0000)
>
> I don't think most ADC mains care about Ziggs, they just want the 4/5-man gangbang meta to end.

^

3-4-man gangbang*

top lane is isolated as hell and can't contribute to 90% of the early game (aka your bot lane gangbang) without either 
a) winning/losing lane realllll early
b) *losing* lane by going bot

It's not Ziggs going bot that upsets ADC players, it's the fact that ADCs are so useless right now that mages have to be brought bot to replace ADCs in the first place. 

Also the only ADCs that go top are Quinn and Vayne. Quinn sucks botlane and Vayne is Vayne. No ADC main is really interested in the toplane.

ADC main are scum

downvote all adcs xd
